paper_title.en: Critical temperature oscillation in the thermal cycle below 16 K in Y0.83Ca0.17Ba2Cu3O6

description.en: In an Y0.83Ca0.17Ba2Cu3O6 polycrystalline sample, under thermal cycling below 16 K, an unusual relaxation effect of the superconducting resistive transition has been observed after the pressure is changed at RT. The normal-state resistivity does not change. Since there is no mobile oxygen in the present sample, the effect of oxygen rearrangement can be ignored. The observed results can be understood by the charge redistribution within the CuO2 planes. (C) 2003 Elsevier Science B.V. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Optical absorption of transition-metal island films:Correlation interaction between conduction electrons of transition metals
Reformation of Curriculum and Physics Education in Asahikawa Medical College
Drastic Curriculum Reformation in Undergraduate Course and Physics Education
Phase Transitions in K<sub>2</sub>Mn<sub>2</sub> (SO<sub>4</sub>)<sub>3</sub> Studied by ESR and Specific Heat.

description.en: The morphology and crystallography of solution-grown crystals of K2Mn2(SO4)3 having a cubic structure with the space group P213 have been examined. The crystals are a single single having a pentagonal-dodecahedral shape. The faces are nonsymmetrical pentagons with a shape similar to one another. The surface orientation deviates from {210} by about 1.5° and is indexed as {210.06}. The origin of the peculiar morphology has been discussed.

paper_title.ja: Optical absorption of continuous-network-structure Ag and Ir films: Presence of particlelike and conduction-electron-localized regions
paper_title.en: Optical absorption of continuous-network-structure Ag and Ir films : Presence of particlelike and conduction-electron-localized regions

description.ja: E. Anno ; M. Tanimoto, Physical Review B, 60(7), 5009-5015, 1999. "Copyright 1999 by the American Physical Society."http://prola.aps.org/abstract/PRB/v60/i7/p5009_1publisherOptical absorption of continuous-network-structure (CNS) Ag and Ir films has been measured in the photonenergy range of 0.5-6.5 eV. As absorption due to conduction electrons, optical plasma-resonance absorption (OPRA), reported for Ag island films consisting of Ag particles, and weak Drude-type absorption (DTA) were found for the CNS Ag films, and only the weak DTA appeared in the CNS Ir films. The finding of the OPRA indicates that particlelike regions, where plasma oscillations of conduction electrons occur as in Ag particles, are present in the CNS Ag films. When the particlelike regions are formed, the region, where DTA occurs, is reduced. This reduction results in the weakening of the DTA. Thus the weak DTA supports the presence of the particlelike regions. If particlelike regions are present in the CNS Ir films also, conduction-electron localization as in Ir particles should occur in the particlelike regions. In this case, only the DTA, weak as in the CNS Ag films, must appear. This agrees with the above appearance. Thus conduction-electron-localized regions are present in the CNS Ir films.

paper_title.en: Specific heat and ESR study of langbeinite-type crystals

description.en: Specific heat was measured on the langbeinite-type crystals K2Mn2(SO4)(3) and (NH4)(2)Cd-2(SO4)(3) by AC calorimetry. Contrary to recent findings by X-ray, dilatometric and adiabatic heat capacity measurements that K2Mn2(SO4)(3) has at least two transitions, only one peak was observed for K2Mn2(SO4)(3) Specific heat was also measured on (NH4)(2)Cd-2(SO4)(3) Sometimes a small secondary peak was observed just below the transition temperature. This was attributed to the effect of strains which exists in the sample. The lineshape of the Mn2+ ESR resonance line of K2Mn2(SO4)(3) was examined in detail as a function of temperature. This method also confirmed the existence of only one phase transition.

paper_title.en: Mn<sup>2+</sup> Electron Spin Resonance Study of Langbeinite-Type K<sub>2</sub>Mn<sub>2</sub>(So<sub>4</sub>)<sub>3</sub>

paper_title.en: A role of the Cu-O chain for the pressure-induced change in the carrier number in Y1-xCaxBa2Cu3Oy system

description.en: Pressure effect on Hall coefficient, RH was investigated in Y0.9Ca0.1Ba2Cu3Oy (6.72≤y≤6.98) samples with Cu-O chain structure and Y1-xCaxBa2Cu3Oy (y=6) samples without Cu-O chain structure. It is found that the Cu-O chain structure is a source of the pressure-induced mobile carrier.

publication_name.en: Physica C: Superconductivity and its Applications

paper_title.ja: 振動を利用した液体の粘性率の測定
U字管による液体の粘性率の測定
paper_title.en: Measuring the Vicosity of Liquid Using a U-shaped Tube

description.ja: U字管内の液体を振動させ,その液面の変位から液体の粘性率を求める簡単な実験装置を開発した。この装置を用いて4種類の液体(メタノール,エタノール,蒸留水,オリーブ油)の粘性率を減衰振動と強制振動のそれぞれの場合の条件下で求めた。強制振動の蒸留水を除けば公表値に近い値を得ることができた。また,蒸留水の異常についての検討も行った。
